title: What are the techniques used in the Quantum Psi course about externalization, regression, and hypnomentalism?
first_phrase: This text is an outline of a four-day program aimed at introducing the techniques of emotional deconstruction through multidimensional communication, which involves working on externalization, double externalization, and hypnomentalism. In the last 200 tokens, the author delves into the communication on various levels such as external, mental, emotional, and physical, as well as the communication model HBDI, DISC, classic temperaments, and more. The ultimate goal is to develop a natural ability to create a connection with others and activate the Vagal Connection, which is vital for healthy communication and dealing with certain neurological conditions.

last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding and practicing the concepts of hypnomentalism, multidimensional communication, enneagram, quantum psi, and developing techniques such as defusion, fascination, and clairvoyance can help you improve your sensitivity and create better connections with others. Remember to work on yourself, be present, approach communication with empathy and positive intent, and use techniques like the light and head rotation to tap into your quantum consciousness. With practice and patience, you can master these techniques and reach new levels of personal growth and understanding.
